text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.title: SIHYWTCAMD Configuration
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.overwo: Mobs don't flee if target is half health
Zombie-like mobs can't be damaged easily
Husks are immune to on-fire damage
Drowned spawn more often with a trident
Drowned have an increased velocity in water
Skeletons flee player if too close
Strays deal slowness 2
Spiders can spawn baby spiders on death
Cave spider jockeys can spawn
Not from spawners!
Cave spiders can spawn naturally in caves
Slimes can spawn with one more size
Small and normal sized slimes can merge
Pillagers get more often piercing enchant
Pillagers can spawn with a speed bonus
Vindicators can spawn in patrols
Vindicators can spawn with a speed bonus
Ravagers can spawn in patrols
Evokers stop arrows
Evokers health is slightly increased
Witches flee player if too close
Witches can spawn a bit more often
Phantoms can see/fly through blocks
Phantoms are repelled by light
Phantoms texture is translucent (client config)
Guardians can spawn naturally
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.nether: Blazes set entities on fire on collision
Ghasts health is increased a lot
Piglins attack player if not wearing X golden armors
Piglins can spawn riding a hoglin
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.end.en: Get blindness when staring at an enderman
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.end.sh: Get blindness when hit by a shulker projectile
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.boss.w: Withers can spawn wither skeletons when half health
